abstract: I tried many of the supports available to help parents heal, like therapy, support groups, exercise and finding a way to honor our sonâ€™s memory.
lead_paragraph: On Sept. 7, 2017, my 31st wedding anniversary, a date marked by happy memories turned tragic. That was when I learned that my 23-year-old son, Garrett, had died by suicide. Two and a half years later, the news that brought me to my knees rings in my memory as if it were delivered just yesterday.
